description: Implement electricity consumption calculator in Laravel with Livewire, porting the legacy Python/Svelte calculator functionality

tasks.title: Create EnergyCalculator service class with calculation logic
tasks.description: Port the Python energy calculator logic from legacy/python/fastapi/api/energy_calculator/ to a Laravel service class.

tasks.title: Create ConsumptionCalculator Livewire component with form UI
tasks.description: Create a Livewire component at app/Livewire/ConsumptionCalculator.php with the calculator form.

tasks.title: Create Blade view for calculator with styled form
Add preset consumption profiles
tasks.description: Add a Presets tab to the calculator that offers quick selection of common consumption profiles.

tasks.title: Integrate calculator results with ContractsList for comparison
tasks.description: Connect the calculator to the contracts comparison via route /laskuri and redirect to ContractsList with calculated consumption.

tasks.title: Add tests for ConsumptionCalculator component
tasks.description: Create feature tests for the ConsumptionCalculator component in tests/Feature/ConsumptionCalculatorTest.php.
